body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Austin Wood and the customer's name is Mary Jackson.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am your customer service representative from Bright Solutions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Sarah! Nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you too! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could you also provide your phone number? Just the numbers will be fine.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John! Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all for now. Thanks for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, John. Have a wonderful day!
